function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Data collection during a period of lockdown may introduce bias based on the participants' circumstances and responses.","Impact":"Inaccurate or misleading data may lead to flawed conclusions and recommendations.","Mitigation":"Carefully evaluate and acknowledge the limitations of the data collected during the lockdown period.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Inconsistencies in the database, stemming from misunderstandings, invalid responses, or typo errors, may compromise the accuracy of the analysis.","Impact":"Unreliable findings and conclusions that do not adequately represent the true situation.","Mitigation":"Thoroughly review and clean the database to eliminate inconsistencies and ensure data quality.","Technologies":"Data cleaning and validation tools","People":"Data analysts, research team","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Lack of a probability sample and exploratory nature of the study may limit the generalizability of the findings.","Impact":"The study's findings may not be applicable to the broader population due to the absence of a representative sample.","Mitigation":"Clearly communicate the limitations of the study and its exploratory nature in the research findings.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research team"}]}
